overview: When Ria, a young sound engineer who is still finding her feet in the film industry, hears a director harassing the lead actress on set, she has to choose between her career and her values. At first it seems like there is nothing she can do, but when the director physically injures the actress and then fires her, Ria comes up with a brilliant plan to expose the sexual harassment. She decides to expose everything at the film's premiere with concrete evidence.
title: Quiet on set
